	                "Passive"                       "1"
	                "IsHidden"                      "1"
	                "IsPurgable"                    "0"

	                // "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
	                {
	                    "RunScript"
	                    {
	                        "ScriptFile"            "lua_abilities/heroes/ursa"
	                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_check_stacks"
	                    }
	                }

	                {
	                    "RunScript"
	                    {
	                        "ScriptFile"            "lua_abilities/heroes/ursa"
	                        "Function"              "fury_swipes_attack"
	                    }
	                }
	            }

	                "IsPurgable"                "0"
	                "IsDebuff"                  "1"

	                    "AttachEffect"
	                    {
	                        "Target"                "TARGET"
	                        "EffectName"            "particles/units/heroes/hero_ursa/ursa_fury_swipes.vpcf"

	                    }

	// Rewrite of the Phantom Lancer Phantom Rush ability
	// Author: YOLOSPAGHETTI
	// Date: February 16, 2016
	// Version: 6.86
	// Type: Datadriven/Lua
	//
	// ----- FILE REQUIREMENTS -----
	// Script files:
	// scripts/vscripts/creatures/abilities/creature_charge.lua
	// scripts/vscripts/libraries/modifiers/modifier_movespeed_cap.lua
	"creature_charge"
	{
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_PASSIVE"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"phantom_lancer_phantom_edge"
		"MaxLevel"						"1"	
		
		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"5"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"1000"
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		
		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile"		"soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_phantom_lancer.vsndevts"
		}
		
		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"

	// Rewrite of the Doom Doom ability
	// Author: Pizzalol
	// Date: 25.02.2015.
	"doom_bringer_doom_ebf"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"ID"							"5342"														// unique ID number for this ability.  Do not change this once established or it will invalidate collected stats.
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_ALL"
		"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"

		"MaxLevel"						"7"

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		"AbilityCooldown"				"200.0"

		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage_scepter"		"400 800 1600 3200 6400 12800 25000"
				"LinkedSpecialBonus"	"special_bonus_unique_doom_5"
			}
			"05"

				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"deniable_pct"			"25 25 25"
			}
		}

	            "Function"      "DoomPurge"
	        }

	            }

	        }

	                "Center"    "TARGET"
	                "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
	            }
	            "Duration"      "%duration"
	        }
	    }
	
	    "Modifiers"
	    {
	        "modifier_doom_datadriven"
	        {
	            "IsDebuff"          "1"
	            "IsPurgable"        "0"

	            "OnCreated"
	            {
	                "AttachEffect"

	"life_stealer_devour"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AUTOCAST | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ATTACK"
		"AbilityType"					"DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"AbilityUnitTargetFlags"		"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_MAGIC_IMMUNE_ENEMIES"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
		"SpellImmunityType"				"SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_YES"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"custom/life_stealer_devour"
		"MaxLevel"						"7"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"			"7"
	
		// Time		
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"150"
	
		// Damage.
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityDamage"					"75 150 300 600 1250 2500 5000"
		"AbilityDuration"				"5"
	
		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"6 12 24 48 96 192 288"
	
		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"heal"				"100"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"5"
			}
		}
	
		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"soundfile" "soundevents/game_sounds_heroes/game_sounds_life_stealer.vsndevts"
			"particle"  "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodbath_eztzhok_burst.vpcf"
			"particle"  "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodrage_eztzhok_ovr.vpcf"
		}
	
		// Datadriven
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	
		"Modifiers"
		{
			// Modifier to handle OrbEffect-Behaviour
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven"
			{
				// Will always stay on the caster once the ability is upgraded
				// Hidden
				"Passive"			"1"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
	
				// OrbEffect-Behaviour
				"Orb"
				{
					"Priority"          "DOTA_ORB_PRIORITY_ABILITY"
					"ProjectileName"    "particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodbath_eztzhok_burst.vpcf"
					"CastAttack"        "1"
				}
	
				// HealthCost is handled here
				"OnOrbFire"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Hero_LifeStealer.PreAttack"
						"Target"		"CASTER"
					}
					"SpendMana"
					{
						"Mana" "%AbilityManaCost"
					}
				}
	
				// Apply the hidden dot modifier to the target here
				// Call IncreaseStackCount to keep stack count on modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter updated
				"OnOrbImpact"
				{
					"ApplyModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff"
						"Target"		"TARGET"
					}
	
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"IncreaseStackCount"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
				}
			}
	
			// Modifier to show stack count
			// Only visual
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				
				"EffectName"		"particles/econ/items/bloodseeker/bloodseeker_eztzhok_weapon/bloodseeker_bloodrage_eztzhok_ovr.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
			}
	
			// Modifier to handle the dot
			"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"1"
				"IsBuff"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsPurgable"		"0"
				"Duration"			"%duration"
	
				// Allow multiple instances of this modifier on the target
				// Modifiers stack additivly (dmg) with independent durations
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
		
				
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"HealDamage"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_lifesteal.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "CASTER"
					}
				}
				
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"HealDamage"
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
					"FireEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"        "particles/generic_gameplay/generic_lifesteal.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
						"Target"            "CASTER"
					}
				}
	
				// Updating visual modifier's stack count
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"lua_abilities/heroes/lifestealer"
						"Function"		"DecreaseStackCount"
	
						"modifier_counter_name"		"modifier_burning_spear_datadriven_debuff_counter"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

			"health_bonus_perstack"		"120 240 460 880 1700 3320 4940"
		}
		"02"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
			"str_bonus_perstack"	"15 20 25 30 55 105 155"
			"LinkedSpecialBonus"	"special_bonus_unique_pudge_1"
		}
		"03"
		{
			"var_type"				"FIELD_FLOAT"
			"duration"				"10 15 20 25 30 35 40"
		}
	}
		
		
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven"  //This modifier is always on Pudge and simply triggers a script when an autoattack lands on an enemy.
			{
				"Passive"   "1"
				"IsHidden"  "1"
				
				"OnAttackLanded"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
							  "ScriptFile" "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
							  "Function" "pudgeHP_shiftOnAttack"
							  "StatLoss"	"%health_bonus_perstack"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_buff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Pudge's modifier bar.
			{
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_debuff_counter"  //A visible counter that will appear in Pudge's target's modifier bar.
			{
				"Duration"			"%duration"
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_buff"
			{
				"Duration"				"%duration"
				"Passive"				"0"
				"IsHidden"  			"1"
				"Attributes"			"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_STATS_STRENGTH_BONUS" "%str_bonus_perstack"
				}
				
				"OnDestroy"  //Decrement the visible counter.
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
							  "ScriptFile" "lua_abilities/abilities_simple.lua"
							  "Function" "pudgeHP_shiftBuffOnDestroy"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_hp_shift_datadriven_debuff"
			{
				"Duration"				"%duration"
				"Passive"				"0"
				"IsHidden"  			"1"
				"Attributes"			"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_MULTIPLE"
				"Properties"

					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_BONUS" "%health_bonus_perstack"

			}
